page.title: 10LAW AND ORDER
page.content: P.C.Robinson helped us with our research.The police station in Dunmow is the oldest in Essex.There are 20 police officers,one of these is a lady They have 6 patrol cars,the fastest is a Ford Sierra.There are 3 shifts, P.C. Robinson prefers the early one.They don't have police dogs in Dunmow but they can borrow them if they need them There are between 6 and 10 break-ins a year.Once when milk was being stolen from doorsteps, P.C.Robinson hid in a bush and watched but didn't catch any one.Most of the police work involves traffic,one of the worst places for speeding is the High Street.We also have a traffic warden to make sure cars aren't parked on double yellow lines.If they are,they get a fine ticket and then the driver has to report to the police station to show necessary documents.
